content: MT-B GL AB OC Angled baseplate Heavy-duty angled baseplate for bracing, long span supports or inclined surfaces, for outdoor use with low pollution ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Higher load resistance – more bolting points and stronger construction than previous Hilti baseplates Corrosion resistance – hot-dip galvanized to help protect against moisture and chemical corrosion Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Applications Mounting MT-80, MT-90 and MT-100 girders on inclined steel surfaces Mounting MT-80, MT-90 and MT-100 at an angle ranging from +/- 90 degrees for bracing or long span supports Fastening heavy-duty, floor-mounted single pipe supports ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q355 or better steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Material thickness: 10 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q355 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Material thickness | 10 mm | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3) ### ITEMS- 2353811 - Baseplate MT-B GL AB OC - Package Size 6 pc
